verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Gittith <WH1665>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. O YY <WH3068> our YY <WH113>, how excellent <WH117> is thy name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776> ! who hast set <WH5414> <WH8798> thy glory <WH1935> above the heavens <WH8064>.

Out of the mouth <WH6310> of babes <WH5768> and sucklings <WH3243> <WH8802> hast thou ordained <WH3245> <WH8765> strength <WH5797> because of thine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>, that thou mightest still <WH7673> <WH8687> the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> and the avenger <WH5358> <WH8693>.
When I consider <WH7200> <WH8799> thy heavens <WH8064>, the work <WH4639> of thy fingers <WH676>, the moon <WH3394> and the stars <WH3556>, which thou hast ordained <WH3559> <WH8790>;
What is man <WH582>, that thou art mindful <WH2142> <WH8799> of him? and the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, that thou visitest <WH6485> <WH8799> him?
For thou hast made him a little <WH4592> lower <WH2637> <WH8762> than the angels <WH430>, and hast crowned <WH5849> <WH8762> him with glory <WH3519> and honour <WH1926>.
Thou madest him to have dominion <WH4910> <WH8686> over the works <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>; thou hast put <WH7896> <WH8804> all things under his feet <WH7272>:
All sheep <WH6792> and oxen <WH504>, yea, and the beasts <WH929> of the field <WH7704>;
The fowl <WH6833> of the air <WH8064>, and the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220>, and whatsoever passeht through <WH5674> <WH8802> the paths <WH734> of the seas <WH3220>.
O YY <WH3068> our YY <WH113>, how excellent <WH117> is thy name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776> !
